subject: Re: [R] PCA  for Binary data
body:
I don't understand, what's wrong with using prcomp in this situation?

On Sunday 10 June 2007 12:50 pm, Ranga Chandra Gudivada wrote:
> Hi,
>

> Component Analysis for Binary data
